name: MSR IT Solution
tag_list: technology-company-uk, technology-company-india, uk-business-solutions, business-solutions-and-consultancy-services, technology-consultancy, business-consultancy-india, business-consultancy-uk, technology-consultancy-uk, technology-consultancy-india, tech
overview:
MSR UK (Registered as MS Research Limited) is a UK based technology company providing business solutions and consultancy services. MSR India (Registered as MSR IT Solution Pvt. Ltd.) based in Kolkata, India is the primary delivery centre for MSR. These technology-enabled solutions help clients achieve competitive advantage, enable cost and time savings and provide fact based consultancy.

MSR currently caters to its clients through its business verticals like Software Services, Technical Helpdesk Services and Infrastructure Management Services. MSR is also providing technical solutions to the Indian Hospitality industry.

With its global presence, MSR successfully serves clients across Europe, Asia-Pacific and the USA. MSR provides on-site, near-site, and offshore working to create solutions within cost. MSR’s industry specific offerings and products create a best-value proposition for our clients.
